name: CI/CD Deploy to GCP Tomcat

on:
  push:
    branches: ["main"]

jobs:
  build-and-deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Checkout source
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      - name: Set up Java
        uses: actions/setup-java@v3
        with:
          distribution: 'temurin'
          java-version: '11'

      - name: Build with Maven
        run: mvn clean package -DskipTests

      - name: Copy WAR to Server via SCP
        uses: appleboy/scp-action@v0.1.7
        with:
          host: ${{ secrets.SSH_HOST }}
          username: ${{ secrets.SSH_USER }}
          key: ${{ secrets.SSH_KEY }}
          port: 22
          source: "target/web-1.0.0-BUILD-SNAPSHOT.war"
          target: "/home/ubuntu/web-1.0.0-BUILD-SNAPSHOT.war"

      - name: Deploy WAR on Tomcat
        uses: appleboy/ssh-action@v0.1.7
        with:
          host: ${{ secrets.SSH_HOST }}
          username: ${{ secrets.SSH_USER }}
          key: ${{ secrets.SSH_KEY }}
          script: |
            sudo systemctl stop tomcat9
            sudo rm -rf /var/lib/tomcat9/webapps/myapp /var/lib/tomcat9/webapps/myapp.war
            sudo mv /home/ubuntu/myapp.war /var/lib/tomcat9/webapps/myapp.war
            sudo chown tomcat:tomcat /var/lib/tomcat9/webapps/myapp.war
            sudo systemctl start tomcat9
